description: Tomosaka Kenryuu is http://anidb.net/ch5077 [Kenji] and http://anidb.net/ch5080 [Suzuka]`s father. He is also a judo instructor in school where Suzuka is attending; he is very strict when teaching her and does not accept failure. Being a single father, he is also kind and cooperative to his children; Kenji calls him "oyaji" (old man). He is bad at household chores but an expert in repairing motorbikes; he handed down his old Triumph machine to his son. During the events of this story Kenryuu secretly harbors a crush for his next-door neighbor http://anidb.net/ch5084 [Konoe Kagami].
name: Tomosaka Kenryuu
